description:
The final battle at the foot of Hakusan. AI Gui, who fights Yu-yu, aims not only for a complete victory but also for the last piece of data to realize the ultimate battle that developer Shingi aspired to. And now, the true power of Gui`s Dragontree Deck begins to awaken.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shin no Saikyou no Sono Saki o
